mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prince Philippe of Orl√©ans, Count of Paris at Mount Vernon, October 8, 1890
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Possibly - Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of Count of Paris and group of dignitaries on the east lawn in front of the southeast corner of the Mansion. The view includes the south porch and balustrade. The photograph has diagonally clipped edges and is adhered to a cardboard mount. Below the photograph is an adhered newspaper article from the Public Ledger, Philadelphia, Thursday Morning, October 9, 1890, describing the visit. On the reverse is an unrelated photograph of the Korean Minister in 1889 - see separate record (DA_001799).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
